title: Ane dialog betuix Experience and ane courteour off the miserabyll estait of the warld. Compylit be Schir Dauid Lyndesay of ye Mont Knycht alias, Lyone Kyng of Armes. And is deuidit in foure partis. As efter followis. .&c.
author: Lindsay, David, Sir, fl. 1490-1555.
publisher: And imprentit [by J. Scot] at the conmand and expensis off Doctor, Machabeus, in Copma[n]houin,
